title: String Ends with Substring
description: In this lab, we will explore how to check if a given string ends with a substring of another string using JavaScript. We will use a for...in loop and String.prototype.slice() to get each substring of the given word, starting at the end. Then, we will use String.prototype.endsWith() to check the current substring against the text. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to use these string methods to find matching substrings in JavaScript.

meta.title: Check if String Ends with Substring
meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to check if a given string ends with a substring of another string.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, endswith, substring, javascript tutor, programming, string

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 字符串以子字符串结尾
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript检查给定字符串是否以另一个字符串的子字符串结尾。我们将使用for...in循环和String.prototype.slice()从给定单词的末尾开始获取每个子字符串。然后，我们将使用String.prototype.endsWith()将当前子字符串与文本进行比较。完成本实验后，你将对如何使用这些字符串方法在JavaScript中找到匹配的子字符串有深入的理解。
